source.content: A co-pilot deliberately crashed the Germanwings plane killing 150 people yet "there was no indication that it is an act of terrorism"? Pftt!

comment.content: @angelpakaigucci paling teruk pon depa akan cakap co-pilot tu ada masalah mental. Never a terrorist
